member.name: DML_INTERMEDIATE_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC
member.summary: Describes a connection within a graph of DirectML operators defined by and passed to . This structure is used to define a connection between internal nodes.

member.name: DML_INTERMEDIATE_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.FromNodeIndex
member.summary: The index of the graph node from which a connection to another node is specified.

member.name: DML_INTERMEDIATE_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.FromNodeOutputIndex
member.summary: The index of the output on the node at index FromNodeIndex where the connection is specified.

member.name: DML_INTERMEDIATE_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.ToNodeIndex
member.summary: The index of the graph node into which a connection from another node is specified.

member.name: DML_INTERMEDIATE_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.ToNodeInputIndex
member.summary: The index of the input on the node at index ToNodeIndex where the connection is specified.

member.name: DML_INTERMEDIATE_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.Name
member.summary: An optional name for the graph connection. If provided, this might be used within certain error messages emitted by the DirectML debug layer.
